entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is injured and needs medical attention. ("He wanted me to bring him back," Harry muttered... "What's happened? What's wrong with him?")

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who helps Harry. (Dumbledore bent down, and with extraordinary strength for a man so old and thin, raised Harry from the ground... "I'll take Harry, Dumbledore...")

entities.name: diggory
entities.description: A person who has died. ("Diggory's dead!" ... "He's ill, he's injured -- Dumble dore, Diggory's parents, they're here...")

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: A person who is concerned about Harry's well-being. ("He'll need to go to the hospital wing!" ... "Fudge was saying loudly.")

relationships.description: Dumbledore helps Harry by raising him from the ground and setting him on his feet. (Dumbledore bent down, and with extraordinary strength for a man so old and thin, raised Harry from the ground... "I'll take Harry, Dumbledore...")
Fudge is concerned about Harry's well-being. ("He'll need to go to the hospital wing!" ... "Fudge was saying loudly.")
Dumbledore is related to Diggory, as he mentions that Diggory's parents are present. ("He's ill, he's injured -- Dumble dore, Diggory's parents, they're here...")
Diggory is related to Harry, as Fudge mentions that Dumbledore should tell him about Diggory before he sees him. ("Don't you think you should tell him -- before he sees -- ?")
